info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 27 at 5:40PM EDT until October 27 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Lake, Orange and Osceola.
* WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Winter Garden, Windermere, Bay Lake, Celebration, Oak Ridge, Four Corners, Horizon West, Bay Hill, Doctor Phillips, Sea World, Universal Studios, Hunters Creek, Yeehaw Junction, Lake Buena Vista, Magic Kingdom, Epcot, Hollywood Studios and Animal Kingdom. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Lake, FL; Orange, FL; Osceola, FL
